scripts.deploy: npm run build:clean && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy:force: npm run build:clean && firebase deploy --only hosting --force
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:clean && npm run deploy:force
scripts.deploy:nocache: npm run build:clean && firebase deploy --only hosting --force && echo âš¡ Clearing Firebase CDN cache... && firebase hosting:clone --source=latest --dest=clear-cache-$(date +%s)
scripts.deploy:immediate: npm run build:clean && firebase deploy --only hosting --force && timeout 5 && curl -X PURGE https://votexlive-3a8cb.web.app/ || echo âœ… Deployment complete - Refresh with Ctrl+F5
scripts.clean: rmdir /s /q node_modules dist build .vite .cache && del package-lock.json
scripts.clean:install: rmdir /s /q node_modules && del package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.clean:deploy: npm run clean:install && npm run build:clean && npm run deploy:immediate
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm install && npm run build:clean
scripts.serve:prod: npm run build:clean && npm run serve
scripts.test:build: npm run build:clean && echo âœ… Build successful || echo âŒ Build failed
scripts.test:serve: npm run build:clean && npm run serve
scripts.update:cache: firebase deploy --only hosting --force && echo âš¡ Cache busted!
